title: Sold - T206 Sovereign 350 Joss Portrait SGC 3

posts.post_title: Sold - T206 Sovereign 350 Joss Portrait SGC 3
posts.post_content:
Sold net delivered/insured.

Full borders, no creases, minor surface wrinkle in lower left corner. Really not very noticeable but wanted to mention it anyway. Clean back. Thanks for looking.
